---

## ‚úÖ Quality Checklist

Please confirm that the skill repository meets our quality standards:

### Source Trust & Authenticity
- [ ] Repository is publicly accessible
- [ ] Repository has a clear owner (organization or individual with established presence)
- [ ] Repository has been active within the last 6 months (not abandoned)
- [ ] Repository has a valid license file (MIT, Apache 2.0, etc.)

### Skill Quality Standards
- [ ] Skills follow the [SKILL.md format](https://github.com/dmgrok/agent_skills_directory/blob/main/schema/catalog-schema.json)
- [ ] Each skill has a clear name and description
- [ ] Skills have appropriate category tags
- [ ] Instructions are well-written and actionable
- [ ] No malicious or harmful content

### Documentation
- [ ] Repository has a README explaining the skills
- [ ] Skills have usage examples or documentation
- [ ] Any dependencies or requirements are documented

### Security & Safety
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets, API keys, or sensitive data
- [ ] No instructions that could cause harm or violate ToS
- [ ] Scripts (if any) are safe and reviewed

---

## üîç Review Process

After submission, our team will:
1. **Verify source authenticity** - Check repository ownership and history
2. **Review skill quality** - Ensure skills meet formatting and content standards
3. **Security scan** - Check for any security concerns
4. **Test integration** - Verify skills can be properly aggregated

**Expected review time:** 3-5 business days

---

*By submitting this request, you confirm that you have the right to share this repository and that it complies with our [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/dmgrok/agent_skills_directory/blob/main/README.md).*
